description: Detects an executable, which is not an internet browser, making DNS request to legit popular websites, which were seen to be used as dead drop resolvers in previous attacks.
author: Sorina Ionescu
X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: One might need to exclude other internet browsers found in it's network or other applications like ones mentioned above from Microsoft Defender.
name: Potential Dead Drop Resolvers
query: (((winlog.event_data.Initiated:true AND destination.domain:(/.*\.[Cc][Ll][Oo][Uu][Dd][Ff][Ll][Aa][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*4[Ss][Hh][Aa][Rr][Ee][Dd]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Aa][Nn][Oo][Nn][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Cc][Dd][Nn]\.[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd][Aa][Pp][Pp]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Dd][Dd][Nn][Ss]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Dd][Ii][Ss][Cc][Oo][Rr][Dd]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]\/[Aa][Pp][Ii]\/[Ww][Ee][Bb][Hh][Oo][Oo][Kk][Ss]\// OR /.*[Dd][Oo][Cc][Ss]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Bb][Oo][Xx]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Dd][Rr][Oo][Pp][Mm][Ee][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ff][Aa][Cc][Ee][Bb][Oo][Oo][Kk]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ff][Ee][Ee][Dd][Ss]\.[Rr][Aa][Pp][Ii][Dd][Ff][Ee][Ee][Dd][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ff][Oo][Tt][Oo][Ll][Oo][Gg]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Gg][Hh][Oo][Ss][Tt][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo]\// OR /.*[Gg][Ii][Ss][Tt]\.[Gg][Ii][Tt][Hh][Uu][Bb][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Ee][Nn][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Hh][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Gg][Uu][Rr]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ll][Ii][Vv][Ee][Jj][Oo][Uu][Rr][Nn][Aa][Ll]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Dd][Ii][Aa][Ff][Ii][Rr][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Mm][Ee][Gg][Aa]\.[Nn][Zz]/ OR /.*[Oo][Nn][Ee][Dd][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee]\.[Ee][Ee]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Bb][Ii][Nn]\.[Pp][Ll]/ OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Ss][Tt][Ee][Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Tt][Ll][Aa][Bb]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Aa][Tt][Ll][Aa][Bb]\.[Nn][Ee][Tt]/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd]\.[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Ii][Tt]\.[Ii][Nn]/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ss][Pp][Aa][Cc][Ee]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Ee][Aa][Mm][Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Uu][Nn][Ii][Tt][Yy]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Ss][Tt][Oo][Rr][Aa][Gg][Ee]\.[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee][Aa][Pp][Ii][Ss]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ OR /.*[Tt]\.[Mm][Ee]/ OR /.*[Tt][Ee][Cc][Hh][Nn][Ee][Tt]\.[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm]/ ((process.executable:(/[Cc]\:\\\\[Pp][Rr][Oo][Gg][Rr][Aa][Mm]\ [Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Ss]\\\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR \([Xx]86\)\\\\[Gg][Oo][Oo][Gg][Ll][Ee]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\\\\[Aa][Pp][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]\\\\[Cc][Hh][Rr][Oo][Mm][Ee]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR
